article:
Formatting specifications for UBL Order Response Simple instances
2004OASIS $Date: 2006-12-20 21:26:10 $(UTC)
Order response simple formatting specifications
Two sample formatting specifications are offered for this document type:
Office-oriented order response simple form
United Nations Layout Key form 320 (subset): Simple Order Acknowledgement
For a list of all formatting specifications and an overview of the documentation conventions, please visit the formatting specification home page.
&FS-status;
